title: Progressi in palestra dopo un mese
author: NFTKing
descrizione: Since I started the gym a month ago I ve gained roughly 1 5kg aiming to gain 1kg a month. The months I spent training before that I didnt track weight at all, which I think was very detrimental to my progress ontop of other factors. My biceps definitely have grown a bit over time very slowly but I can t say the same for my tris.

title: Preferenze dopo un infortunio alla spalla
author: CryptoCrafter
descrizione: I have a rebuilt right shoulder, so my preferences are odd.

title: Bicarbonato come alternativa alla beta alanina
author: LedgerLord
descrizione: Do people still recommend baking soda as an alternative to beta alanine?

title: Limiti degli studi basati sulla massa corporea
author: SecuritySeal
descrizione: However most of these studies are, implicitly or explicitly depending on the study, based on lean bodymass, target body mass or some other function of current bodymass to try to control for overweight participants. Thanks for emphasizing this. This part seems to get left out a lot.

title: Importanza della dieta durante il cut
author: ChainChaser
descrizione: The two most consistent pieces of advice you ll get are that a cut is going to come from what you eat, not directly from exercise, and that you re better off tracking calories and weight over time to figure out if you re in a caloric deficit instead of relying on online calculators or the formulas they use. The formulas are based on the central tendencies in groups of people, not a reliable and accurate calculation for each individual who might use them. Edit: Also, that amount of physical activity without actual rest days during a cut sounds unhealthy, but I am not a doctor.

title: Bere Gatorade è sufficiente?
author: NodeNomad
descrizione: Bevi semplicemente un po’ di Gatorade. Dai troppa importanza a un concetto nebuloso come 'salutare'.

title: Bevo meno ma mi sento ancora alticcio
author: DAODev
descrizione: Credo che gli alcolici siano più efficaci. Tutta la birra che bevo sembra tanto rispetto a due shot con acqua e limone. Curioso se ci sono raccomandazioni migliori!

author: LedgerLord
descrizione: Thanks

title: Provo così
author: ChainChaser
descrizione: I'll give that a go

title: Progresso con GZCLP
author: Web3Nomad
descrizione: I can basically do this on gzclp right? Aiming to get more reps on AMRAP and not adding weight instead then adding 2.5 kg each side of the bench for example and being able to get the same reps again

title: Allenamento efficace con poco tempo
author: Web3Wizard
descrizione: Best thing to do if you are time limited is remove all isolation and do compounds only. Particularly the big compounds like deadlift, squat, bench, row

title: Macchine vs esercizi liberi
author: GasGuru
descrizione: Mostly, though you can still cheat the exercise, for example giving it a little motion with your legs. Machines eliminate even the little things like that; in exchange you may lose out on some supporting muscle groups that you would normally use to hold proper form

title: Importanza di completare le serie
author: GasGuru
descrizione: completing the sets is always better

title: Alternative migliori a StrongLifts

descrizione: Never run SL. It's reputation is that it is ok for beginner, but pretty limited otherwise. My understanding is that any of the programs in the wiki would be a better choice

title: Conferma su un'affermazione
author: DAODev
descrizione: Aye, for the most part

title: Scelta consigliata
author: MetaMaster
descrizione: that is what i would do and recommend

title: Ripetizioni e carichi nel TM
author: NodeNomad
descrizione: It sounds weird given the name of the program, but with a proper TM you really want to be hitting 10 reps on the light week, 8 on the medium, and 5 on the heavy. Assuming you are using an 85% training max

title: Controllo lento per evitare il lockout
author: SmartContractor
descrizione: No definitely just a slow controlled push to lockout

title: Confusione sul metodo GZCLP
author: MetaMaster
descrizione: Gzclp for some reason sounds complicated to me  I ve checked the spreadsheet and confused as hell  there s so much information  to read  idk where to begin with it tbh

title: Curiosità sul caricamento della creatina
author: MetaMaster
descrizione: Why is it not needed   I m not disagreeing btw I have no idea when it comes to creatine haha  just genuinely curious because I seen a few people say you should load

title: Grazie per il consiglio
author: NodeNomad
descrizione: appreciate the advice bro

title: Dilemma tra forza e femminilità
author: CryptoCat
descrizione: I m 168 cm and 66 kg  fat  was 22  when I got DXA scanned in march and I have since gotten leaner  I don t want to lose more body fat since I m a woman and body fat is important for reproductive health and endocrine function and any lower than 21 can definitely cause that  and also don t wanna lose my boobs  Rn I feel like i have to pick between looking feminine vs getting stronger and it kinda sucks

title: Risposta breve e giusta
author: EtherExplorer
descrizione: Fair

title: Consigli dietetici per disturbi e anemia
author: Web3Nomad
descrizione: Maybe speak with your doctor about possible dietary changes you can make that might benefit this disorder  From the 2 seconds of googling  it looks like one of the side effects of that disorder is anemia  maybe making an effort to eat more foods rich in iron could be helpful  Maybe an iron supplement  I m not a doctor and i m just throwing out ideas    While you may have a healthy diet  making minor adjustments to better serve you as an individual should always be your first step imo        9 hours at night and 2 in the afternoon  I m jealous of the afternoon nap haha  Are you sleeping in the afternoon because you re tired from your disorder you think  Cus sometimes  when I sleep TOO much  I feel like sluggish shit  There s a happy medium to be had for sure

title: Forma perfetta non esiste, punta a non farti male
author: NodeNomad
descrizione: Doesn t matter what your form looks like  Form is different for everyone  Find a way to execute the movement without pain  Your form will improve as you train  Eventually your form will have to get more efficient so that you can move more weight  Everyone has some pelvic tilt  if you aren t in pain I wouldn t worry about it

title: Consigli per la gestione della dieta e della paura dei carboidrati
author: NodeNomad
descrizione: Congrats on losing 150lbs and fixing your diabetes     But you absolutely need to work on your fear of carbs  They aren t the enemy  I would stay away from ultra processed carbs  but there s nothing wrong with having a bit of potato or rice as part of your diet  Just keep it within portion and don t binge on it  Adding in some fruit could also help    I would also work on making your diet a little less strict  Eating the exact same thing daily could potentially lead to nutrition holes depending on what you re eating  Plus  you really should work towards being able to eat a variety of things while maintaining your health and weight    Do you do any stand alone cardio  Or just lift   A year in on training is a drop in the bucket still    esp if you haven t been seeing results  BUT also considering you were 150lbs higher than you are now  i m sure some of your weight is loose skin  so maybe less on the chubbier side than my initial thought  I think what you should do is focus on getting your diet in order first and maintain weight for the moment  If anything  err slightly on the side of weight gain  but not enough for it to be a true  bulk   Figure out your carb   energy issue and once you re feeling good  then you can try bulking

title: Reflessi e coordinazione si allenano
author: CryptoCat
descrizione: Like what  Reflexes  Coordination  Because these are all things that are learned  They don t come naturally to people   People who have played a lifetime of sports will likely have much better reflexes and coordination compared to somebody who s sedentary  simply because they ve had a lifetime of practice

title: Uso di giubbotto zavorrato in ufficio?
author: ChainChaser
descrizione: Can I ask why you want to wear a weighted vest during an office job    Generally speaking wearing a weighted vest all day is not recommended  or particularly beneficial   If it was heavy enough to register in terms of training intensity  then it would certainly impede your work performance non trivially    and if it was not heavy enough for you really to notice  then I expect it s not worth the hassle and discomfort of wearing all day    What is it you re hoping to achieve exactly  Slowly building up to walking or jogging with intensity while wearing a weighted vest   or using it to add nontrivial resistance during resistance training   is quite different from just wearing it at work while you walk around    I don t know maybe I m missing something but this is never something I d recommend   Things that make you more tired at the end of the workday don t necessarily have correspondingly useful training outcomes

title: Guadagno muscolare in deficit: cosa aspettarsi
author: DAODev
descrizione: I would not recommend doing general gainz on a deficit   You can do jacked and tan on a deficit and probably still make strength gains  but it s unlikely you ll put on much muscle

title: Dubbi sulla tecnica dei curl
author: LedgerLord
descrizione: I m sorry but are you sure you are curling with good form  I ve never heard someones curl go up 15 pounds within 2 months

title: Forma rigorosa con bilancieri e manubri
author: DAppDynamo
descrizione: Not really    You can just use strict form on bbs and dbs

title: Isolamento muscolare e rischio di squilibri
author: LedgerLord
descrizione: Depends on your objective  In general  no  Ever see pictures of synthol abuse  Similar idea  Let s go back to the bicep example  you do isolation exercises only  no only are you now investing a lot more time because you need to individually target every muscle  you re risking imbalances  Big biceps  disproportionate triceps  forearms  shoulders  etc   You can totally do it if you want  but even if you do it right and train evenly  expect to spend a hell of a lot more time accomplishing the same thing

title: Pareri su fasce per caviglie e polsi
author: TokenTornado
descrizione: Some are  some are not  I have  these for my ankles  https   www amazon com Comfortable Adjustable Neoprene Kickback Exercises dp B0888Q42Y4     The padding does not overlap and the D rings can get a bit irritating sometimes  I wouldn t say these are the best  but they are pretty cheap and do the job well

title: Contributi a riduzione dei dolori muscolari
author: Web3Nomad
descrizione: Could contribute a bit   But I think that strength work in itself is enough to reduce soreness  Provided you aren t adding a lot of extra volume all the time  It s possible that a slight bit of additional volume could help a bit  But not necessary to build strength or muscle

title: Allungamenti e problemi di postura

descrizione: I m curious what your posture is like before and after this program

descrizione: My interpretation is the stimulus to make your muscles grow comes from a combination of load  volume and training density
